text: Maryland's 4th congressional district is around the eastern edge of Washington, D.C., taking in most of Prince George's County and a small part of Montgomery County. It is home to College Park, Fort Washington, Greenbelt, and Laurel. With a median household income of $86,941, it is the wealthiest black- majority district in the United States. ==References== Category:Congressional districts of Maryland
title: Maryland's 4th congressional district
